purpose_per_file..github/workflows/prod-spec-gates.yml: Fix fallback report creation and merge-blocking decision logic for PROD_SPEC gates.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/INVENTORY.j: Record deterministic evidence inventory and metadata for this CI fix change set.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/PR_DESCRIPT: Provide PR addendum summarizing WHAT/WHY/EVIDENCE/COMPAT for the workflow fix.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/commands.tx: Log executed commands for reproducible audit evidence.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/outputs/00_: Capture baseline branch, HEAD SHA, and clean status before edits.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/outputs/01_: Capture pre-fix workflow excerpt around gate checker and parsing steps.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/outputs/02_: Capture post-fix workflow excerpt proving applied modifications.
purpose_per_file.build_proof/prod_spec_ci_fix/outputs/03_: Capture CI offload attempt evidence and merge-blocking unavailability details.
